name: 簡伽蓉
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week 1	Orientation
Week 2	Unit 1. A. The World of Advertising: Reading One,
B. Advertising on the Air: Listening One.
Week 3	Unit 1. A. The World of Advertising: Reading Two,
B. Advertising on the Air: Listening Two.
Week 4	Review 1.
Week 5	Unit 2. A. Fraud: Reading One,
B. Identity Theft: Listening One.
Week 6	Unit 2. A. Fraud: Reading Two,
B. Identity Theft: Listening Two.
Week 7	Review 2.
Week 8	Class midterm exam
Week 9	Proficiency Test
Weel 10	Unit 3. A. Going to Extremes: Reading One,
B. Endurance Test: Listening One.
Week 11	Unit 3. A. Going to Extremes: Reading Two,
B. Endurance Test: Listening Two.
Week 12	Review 3.
Week 13	Unit 4. A. Speaking of Gender: Reading One,
B. Separated by the Same Language: Listening One.
Week 14.	Unit 4. A. Speaking of Gender: Reading Two,
B. Separated by the Same Language: Listening Two.
Week 15	Review 4.
Week 16	Unit 5. A. Ecotourism: Reading One,
B. Culture and Commerce: Listening One.
Week 17	Class Final Exam
Week 18	Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
A.Grades through the whole semester 70%:
  Midterm Exam 13%, Final Exam 15%, Oral Test 12% Quizzes 30%
B.Proficiency Test (Midterm) 15%
C.Proficiency Test (Final) 15%
materials:
Barton, Laurie and Carolyn Dupaquier Sardinas. North Star 3: Reading and Writing. 3rd ed. White Plains: Pearson, 2009.
Solorzano, Helen S. and Jennifer P. L. Schmidt. North Star 3: Listening and Speaking. 3rd ed. White Plains: Pearson, 2009.
